UPDATE your windows, UPDATE you nvidia driver, INSTALL AND UPDATE steam (from the official website obviously) and I'll repeat it again DO YOUR DAMN WINDOWS UPDATE (even if you don't have a legit version of windows) it fixed ALL my problems with every torrents installation AND in-game crash (do the important update only) it will update frameworks and visual cc wich are in most case THE MAIN REASON why you have problems with directx AND the program has stopped working since it's a NEW game on a NEW engine you MUST update period. block your firewall and try running as an administrator also, it always help.
